# AI-Based School Bus Routing & Real-Time Tracking System

## Project Overview
Advanced school bus routing system using AI, ML, DL, and XAI for intelligent route optimization and real-time tracking.

## Technology Stack
- **Backend**: Python, Flask/FastAPI
- **AI/ML**: scikit-learn, genetic algorithms, reinforcement learning
- **Deep Learning**: TensorFlow, PyTorch for demand forecasting
- **XAI**: SHAP, LIME for explainability
- **Real-time**: MQTT, WebSocket
- **Database**: PostgreSQL, Redis
- **Frontend**: React, Leaflet/Folium maps
- **Routing**: OSRM, Google Maps API

## Key Features
1. Intelligent route optimization using genetic algorithms
2. Reinforcement learning for adaptive routing
3. Deep learning demand forecasting
4. Explainable AI for transparency
5. Real-time GPS tracking with MQTT
6. Interactive map visualization
7. Parent notification system
8. Traffic-aware routing

## Development Guidelines
- Use type hints in Python code
- Document AI model decisions with XAI
- Implement comprehensive error handling
- Write unit tests for all AI models
- Follow REST API best practices
- Optimize for real-time performance
